description: Details required for Condition 7 (sustainable drainage strategy) of planning permission 21/03301/FUL (Removal of the existing outbuilding and the erection of part single, part two storey rear extension and two storey side extension in association with creation of 1no. one-bedroom unit and 1no. three-bedroom unit with associated parking, landscaping, amenity space, refuse/recycling facilities and cycle storage)
decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 7 (sustainable drainage strategy) of planning permission 21/03301/FUL. The applicant has not demonstrated that drainage prevents the risk of flooding to and from the site in accordance with policy SI.13 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS1 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
